sentences.en: Amongst the bridal train , the two most noticeable personages were the youthful bridesmen.
sentences.cn: 在结婚仪式的行列中, 最引人注意的人物是那两个年轻男傧相.

sentences.en: Apollonia was still wearing her bridal costume with a cloak thrown over it.
sentences.cn: 阿波罗妮娅仍然还穿着那套新娘礼服,上面还披着一件大氅.

sentences.en: If I don't leave this house in a bridal sedan - chair , I won't go!
sentences.cn: 告诉你, 我出回门子,还是非坐花轿不出这个门!

sentences.en: Meggie was so against a fuss she even refused to wear bridal regalia.
sentences.cn: 麦琪大力反对铺张,甚至拒绝穿华丽的新婚礼服.

sentences.en: Most importantly, the bridal gown should bring a smile to your face.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是, 一件婚纱应该能为你的面庞带来微笑.

sentences.en: On the sixth day of the New Year , Tigress climbed into the bridal sedan - chair.
sentences.cn: 初六, 虎妞坐上了花轿.

sentences.en: She had on [ was wearing ] all her bridal decorations.
sentences.cn: 她 穿戴 着所有的新娘装饰品.

sentences.en: She wore a floor length bridal gown.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件拖地长婚纱。

sentences.en: That's after the take - out at Bridal Creek.
sentences.cn: 那是过了拜德克里克之后的一段旅程.

sentences.en: The bridal bouquet has traditionally been a symbol of fertility.
sentences.cn: 在传统上,新娘花束时儿女满堂的象征.

sentences.en: The Bridal Department will have experts on hand to give you all the help and advice you need.
sentences.cn: 婚礼用品部会有现成的专家为您提供所需的一切帮助和建议。

sentences.en: The bridal suite was prepared for the reception of the honeymooners.
sentences.cn: 新婚套间已准备好以接待度蜜月的人.

sentences.en: They put the summer home at the disposal of the bridal couple.
sentences.cn: 他们叫那对新婚夫妇随意使用那所别墅.

sentences.en: This stupendous fragmentariness heightened the dream - like strangeness of her bridal life.
sentences.cn: 这架庞大的残骸,使她的新婚生活更变得象梦一般光怪陆离.

sentences.en: We played the bride and bridegroom into the bridal chamber.
sentences.cn: 我们奏乐把新娘新郎迎进新房.

trans.tran_cn: 新婚的，婚礼的，新人的，新娘的
trans.tran_en: relating to a wedding or a woman who is getting married
